items.title: Support for additional languages
items.subtitle:
This version adds translations for Georgian, Ingush, Chechen, Uzbek and Kyrgyz languages.
Credits: @marginani, Zara ت, 𝔄𝔪𝔦𝔰𝔥𝔨𝔞, زالينة بلييفا, @m5164841, Айдана К.

items.title: «Virtues of dhikr» widget
items.subtitle: Azkar now has a widget which displays different virtues of remembrance of Allah.

items.title: New "bedtime" adhkar category
items.subtitle: Part of evening adhkar was split into a new category.

items.title: Adhkar Counter functionality improvements.
items.subtitle: Now you can pick size of the counter in Settings menu.
